format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

Site Transfer Form

{{ _(doc.name) }}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set emp = frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.employee, ["employee_name","designation","branch"], as_dict=1) if doc.employee else {} %}
PERSONAL DETAILS
Employee: {{ doc.employee }} Full Name(s): {{ doc.employee_name or (emp.employee_name if emp else "") }}
Designation: {{ doc.designation or (emp.designation if emp else "") }} Current Site: {{ doc.current_branch or (emp.branch if emp else "") }}
"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
TRANSFER DETAILS
Transfer To Site: {{ doc.new_branch }}
Effective Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transfer_date, "d MMMM yyyy") if doc.transfer_date else "" }}
Reason: {{ doc.reason or "" }}
"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
SIGNATURES
Site Manager Employee Safety Officer
Date
Name {{ doc.requested_by_name or "" }} {{ doc.employee_name or "" }}
Signature
Area HR HR HOD Payroll Relevant HOD
Date
Name
Signature
"}]
name: Site Transfer Form
